column4: anyone know why my pcmcia network card would stop working after a kernel  update today to 2.6.15-27?
oh you know what perhaps you need the linux-restricted-modules for the new kernel you are running.
how'd you get the atheros driver?
did it work out of the box or did you have to do something to get it working.
it worked out of the box as ath0 until today when i did an update on the kernel
I don't have the same card but i'm assuming what happened is whatever module you where using for that card didn't get installed with the new kernel.
if it uses restricted modules you would have to install them.
any ideas how to fix?  i have no network connection without that card
yeah the easy fix for right now would be to use the old kerenl just select it from grub's boot menu
untill you figure out what exactly is going on
it appears that atheros uses madwifi
did you try posting to the forums?
or searching them for that matter?
not yet, will try that if I can't get it to work, searches yielded nothing
